mapper.select: SELECT car.car_id car_id, car.name car_name, car.type car_type, car.fuel fuel, car.consumption consumption, cp.picture picture FROM car JOIN car_picture cp on car.picture_id = cp.picture_id
SELECT car_id, name car_name, type car_type, fuel, consumption, picture_id from car;
SELECT picture_id, name, subname, type, color, picture FROM car_picture

SELECT car.car_id car_id, car.name car_name, car.type car_type, car.fuel fuel, car.consumption consumption, cp.picture picture FROM car JOIN car_picture cp on car.picture_id = cp.picture_id WHERE car.car_id = #{carId}
SELECT picture_id, name, subname, type, color, picture FROM car_picture WHERE picture_id = #{pictureId}

SELECT car.car_id car_id, car.name car_name, car.type car_type, car.fuel fuel, car.consumption consumption, cp.picture picture FROM car JOIN car_picture cp on car.picture_id = cp.picture_id WHERE upper(car.name) like upper(#{carName})

SELECT car.car_id car_id, car.name car_name, car.type car_type, car.fuel fuel, car.consumption consumption, cp.picture picture FROM car JOIN car_picture cp on car.picture_id = cp.picture_id WHERE upper(car.type) like upper(#{carType})

SELECT car.car_id car_id, car.name car_name, car.type car_type, car.fuel fuel, car.consumption consumption, cp.picture picture FROM car JOIN car_picture cp on car.picture_id = cp.picture_id WHERE upper(car.fuel) like upper(#{carFuelType})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO car (name, type, fuel, consumption, picture_id) VALUES (#{car.name}, #{car.type}, #{car.fuel}, #{car.consumption}, #{car.pictureId})
mapper.update: UPDATE car SET (name, type, fuel, consumption, picture_id) = (#{car.name}, #{car.type}, #{car.fuel}, #{car.consumption}, #{car.pictureId}) WHERE car_id = #{car.carId}
